ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Over 10 years of experience serving Montreal
ABOUT.STORY_TEXT: Founded in 2014, EcoNet Cleaning was born from the vision of creating a cleaning service that respects both our clients and our environment.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: To provide exceptional cleaning services while preserving the health of our clients and our planet.

HERO.TITLE: Our Story, Your Cleanliness
HERO.SUBTITLE: Your trusted partner for eco-friendly and professional cleaning in Montreal for over 5 years.

STORY.TITLE: Our Story
PARAGRAPHS: Founded in 2019 by a team passionate about the environment and service quality, EcoNet Cleaning was born from the desire to revolutionize the cleaning industry in Quebec.
Recognizing the negative impact of traditional chemical products on health and the environment, we decided to create a 100% eco-friendly alternative without compromising effectiveness.
Today, with over 500 satisfied clients and a team of 15 professionals, we are proud to be the pioneers of eco-friendly cleaning in the Montreal region.

VALUES.TITLE: Our Values
VALUES.SUBTITLE: The principles that guide each of our actions

ENVIRONMENT.TITLE: Environmental Respect
ENVIRONMENT.DESCRIPTION: We exclusively use biodegradable and ecosystem-friendly products to preserve our planet.

QUALITY.TITLE: Quality & Excellence
QUALITY.DESCRIPTION: Every intervention is carried out according to our highest standards to guarantee your satisfaction.

TRANSPARENCY.TITLE: Transparency
TRANSPARENCY.DESCRIPTION: We communicate openly about our practices, products, and processes.

INNOVATION.TITLE: Innovation
INNOVATION.DESCRIPTION: We constantly invest in new technologies and eco-friendly cleaning methods.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Community
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: We actively contribute to the well-being of our local community.

INTEGRITY.TITLE: Integrity
INTEGRITY.DESCRIPTION: We act with honesty and ethics in all our business relationships.

MARIE_CLAUDE.NAME: Marie-Claude Dubois
MARIE_CLAUDE.DESCRIPTION: Passionate about the environment and entrepreneurship, Marie-Claude founded EcoNet Cleaning with the vision of revolutionizing the cleaning industry.

JEAN_FRANCOIS.NAME: Jean-François Martin
JEAN_FRANCOIS.DESCRIPTION: With 10 years of experience in commercial cleaning, Jean-François supervises all our operations with exemplary attention to detail.

SOPHIE.NAME: Sophie Tremblay
SOPHIE.DESCRIPTION: A trained chemist, Sophie develops and selects all our eco-friendly products to ensure effectiveness and environmental respect.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: To provide exceptional cleaning services that protect our clients' health and preserve the environment for future generations.

TRANSPARENT.DESCRIPTION: No hidden costs. The agreed price is the final price, guaranteed.

SATISFACTION.DESCRIPTION: Not satisfied? We come back free within 24h to correct it.

BEST_PRICE.TITLE: Best Price
BEST_PRICE.DESCRIPTION: Found cheaper elsewhere? We match competitor prices.

PAYMENT_METHODS.QUESTION: 💳 What payment methods do you accept?
PAYMENT_METHODS.ANSWER: We accept credit cards, debit, Interac transfer and cash payment.

ADVANCE_PAYMENT.QUESTION: 📅 Do I have to pay in advance?
ADVANCE_PAYMENT.ANSWER: No, payment is made after the service, once you are satisfied with the result.

EXTRA_FEES.QUESTION: 📋 Are there any extra fees?
EXTRA_FEES.ANSWER: All our prices include products, equipment and travel in the Montreal region.

MODIFY_BOOKING.QUESTION: 🔄 Can I modify my booking?
MODIFY_BOOKING.ANSWER: Yes, free modifications up to 24h before service. After that, fees may apply.

LOCATION_PRICING.QUESTION: 🎯 Do prices vary by neighborhood?
LOCATION_PRICING.ANSWER: Our prices are fixed throughout the metropolitan area. No surcharge by neighborhood.

CUSTOM_QUOTE.QUESTION: 📞 How do I get a personalized quote?
CUSTOM_QUOTE.ANSWER: Contact us by phone or form. We offer free quotes within 24h.

HERO.TITLE: Privacy Policy
HERO.SUBTITLE: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we protect and use your personal information.

INTRO.PARAGRAPH1: At EcoNet Cleaning, we are committed to protecting your privacy and respecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our eco-friendly cleaning services.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH2: By using our services, you agree to the practices described in this policy. We encourage you to read this document carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.

PERSONAL.TITLE: Personal Information
PERSONAL.CONTENT: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us when you:

AUTOMATIC.TITLE: Automatically Collected Information
AUTOMATIC.CONTENT: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website:

USE.TITLE: Information Use
USE.INTRO: We use your personal information to:

ITEMS.PROVIDE_SERVICES: Provide and maintain our cleaning services
ITEMS.COMMUNICATE: Communicate with you about your service
ITEMS.IMPROVE_SERVICES: Improve our services and your experience
ITEMS.MARKETING: Send you promotional information (with your consent)

SHARING.TITLE: Information Sharing
SHARING.INTRO: We never sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following cases:

ITEMS.BUSINESS_TRANSFER: In case of business merger or acquisition

SECURITY.TITLE: Data Security
SECURITY.CONTENT: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies and Similar Technologies
COOKIES.CONTENT: Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your user experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Rights
RIGHTS.INTRO: In accordance with applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:

CHILDREN.TITLE: Children's Privacy
CHILDREN.CONTENT: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If you are a parent and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

CHANGES.TITLE: Changes to this Policy
CHANGES.CONTENT: We may modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will take effect upon posting on our website. We encourage you to regularly review this page to stay informed about our practices.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.INTRO: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data protection practices, please contact us:

CTA.TITLE: Questions About Privacy?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Our team is here to help you understand our data protection practices.

HERO.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
HERO.SUBTITLE: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. These terms govern your relationship with EcoNet Cleaning.

INTRO.PARAGRAPH1: Welcome to EcoNet Cleaning. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our eco-friendly cleaning services and website. By booking our services or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
INTRO.PARAGRAPH2: Please read these Terms carefully before using our services. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

ACCEPTANCE.TITLE: Acceptance of Terms
ACCEPTANCE.CONTENT: By accessing our website, booking our services, or engaging with EcoNet Cleaning in any way, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and EcoNet Cleaning.

SERVICES.TITLE: Services Description
SERVICES.INTRO: EcoNet Cleaning provides professional eco-friendly cleaning services including but not limited to:

ITEMS.RESIDENTIAL: Residential cleaning services for homes and apartments
ITEMS.COMMERCIAL: Commercial cleaning for offices and businesses
ITEMS.SPECIALIZED: Specialized cleaning services as agreed upon

SERVICES.DISCLAIMER: Service availability may vary by location and is subject to our operational capacity and scheduling constraints.

PROCESS.TITLE: Booking Process
PROCESS.CONTENT: Services must be booked in advance through our website, phone, or email. All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation by EcoNet Cleaning. We reserve the right to decline service requests at our discretion.

SCHEDULING.TITLE: Scheduling
SCHEDULING.CONTENT: We will make every effort to arrive at the scheduled time. However, service times are estimates and may be subject to change due to unforeseen circumstances. We will notify you of any significant delays.

ACCESS.TITLE: Property Access
ACCESS.CONTENT: You must provide safe and reasonable access to the areas requiring cleaning. If access is denied or restricted, additional charges may apply for return visits.

PRICING.TITLE: Pricing
PRICING.CONTENT: Prices are quoted based on the information provided and are subject to change if the actual scope of work differs significantly from the initial assessment. All prices include applicable taxes unless otherwise stated.

METHODS.TITLE: Payment Methods
METHODS.CONTENT: We accept cash, credit cards, debit cards, and Interac e-transfers. Payment is due upon completion of services unless other arrangements have been made in advance.

LATE_PAYMENT.TITLE: Late Payment
LATE_PAYMENT.CONTENT: For commercial accounts with approved credit terms, a service charge of 1.5% per month may be applied to overdue accounts.

CLIENT_CANCELLATION.TITLE: Client Cancellation
CLIENT_CANCELLATION.CONTENT: You may cancel or reschedule your service up to 24 hours before the scheduled time without penalty. Cancellations made with less than 24 hours notice may be subject to a cancellation fee of up to 50% of the service cost.

COMPANY_CANCELLATION.TITLE: Company Cancellation
COMPANY_CANCELLATION.CONTENT: EcoNet Cleaning reserves the right to cancel services due to weather conditions, safety concerns, or other unforeseen circumstances. In such cases, we will reschedule at no additional cost or provide a full refund.

INSURANCE.TITLE: Insurance Coverage
INSURANCE.CONTENT: EcoNet Cleaning carries comprehensive liability insurance covering damage to client property during the provision of our services. Our insurance coverage is limited to $2,000,000 per incident.

LIMITATIONS.TITLE: Limitations of Liability
LIMITATIONS.CONTENT: Our liability is limited to the cost of the service provided. We are not responsible for damage to items that are inherently fragile, antique, or of unusual value unless specifically noted in writing prior to service.

CLAIMS.TITLE: Damage Claims
CLAIMS.CONTENT: Any damage claims must be reported within 24 hours of service completion. Claims reported after this period may not be eligible for coverage.

ITEMS.PREPARATION: Prepare the space by removing fragile or valuable items from cleaning areas
ITEMS.ACCESS: Provide safe and unobstructed access to all areas requiring cleaning
ITEMS.PETS: Secure pets or inform our team of their presence and temperament
ITEMS.HAZARDS: Inform us of any known hazards or special requirements
ITEMS.VALUABLES: Secure cash, jewelry, and other valuables before our arrival
ITEMS.UTILITIES: Ensure necessary utilities (water, electricity) are available

INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY.TITLE: Intellectual Property
INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY.CONTENT: All content on our website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is the property of EcoNet Cleaning and is protected by Canadian and international copyright laws. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our written permission.

TERMINATION.TITLE: Termination
TERMINATION.CONTENT: Either party may terminate ongoing service agreements with 30 days written notice. EcoNet Cleaning reserves the right to immediately terminate services for non-payment, unsafe working conditions, or abusive behavior toward our staff.

GOVERNING_LAW.TITLE: Governing Law
GOVERNING_LAW.CONTENT: These Terms are governed by the laws of Quebec, Canada. Any disputes arising from these Terms or our services will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Quebec.

CHANGES.TITLE: Changes to Terms
CHANGES.CONTENT: EcoNet Cleaning reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be posted on our website and will take effect immediately upon posting. Continued use of our services after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Information
CONTACT.INTRO: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

CTA.TITLE: Ready to Get Started?
CTA.SUBTITLE: Now that you understand our terms, let's schedule your eco-friendly cleaning service.
